title: [Large-Scale] Design and Evaluation of Mathematics Educational Video Games Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and general understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to understand design principles and analyze learning effectiveness of math educational video games

learning_goals: Learners can apply four design principles (concept interaction, sustained challenge, clear instructions, efficient navigation) in educational video games
Learners design gamified math problem-solving scenarios incorporating game mechanics elements
Learners can propose strategies for managing cognitive load in video game-based learning environments

resources: Educational Game Development Tools (e.g., Unity, Scratch)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
